participant_1.background:
I often spend hours researching vintage cars online.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I enjoy the quiet solitude of my life on the farm.
some jokes go too far.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

participant_2.background:
I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog.
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

content.text: It's going well! I just got done spending some time with my alpacas.
Wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to see an alpaca in person.
They're really cool animals. They're super friendly and they're great for stress relief.
That's good to hear. I could definitely use some stress relief.
If you ever get a chance, I highly recommend visiting a farm that has alpacas.
I'll definitely keep that in mind. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out at my apartment. I'm getting ready to go to the skatepark later.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've never been to a skatepark before.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely check it out sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! Have a good day!
